Tos.title: Terms of use
Tos.phase1: 1. Terms By accessing the website at Yield Master you are agreeing to be bound by these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.
Tos.phase2: 2. Use License Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Yield Master's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a licence, not a transfer of title, and under this licence you may not:modify or copy the materials;use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial);attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Yield Master website;remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; ortransfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.This licence shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Yield Master at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this licence, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
Tos.phase3: 3. Disclaimer The materials on Yield Master's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Yield Master makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.Further, Yield Master does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
Tos.phase4: 4. Limitations In no event shall Yield Master or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Yield Master's website, even if Yield Master or a Yield Master authorised representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
Tos.phase5: 5. Accuracy of materialsThe materials appearing on Yield Master's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Yield Master does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current. Yield Master may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However Yield Master does not make any commitment to update the materials.
Tos.phase6: 6. Links Yield Master has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Yield Master of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
Tos.phase7: 7. Modifications Yield Master may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
Tos.phase8: 8. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Yield Master and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

question1.question: What are the main benefits of using Yield Master?
question1.answer: YIeld Master allows you to make more strategic and informed investment decisions, reducing the risk of financial loss. Plus, it helps maximize your dividend growth potential, allowing you to reach your financial goals faster.

question2.question: Is Yield Master suitable for beginner investors?
question2.answer: Yes, Yield Master can be used by beginner investors, as it provides clear and objective recommendations. It helps reduce the complexity of the financial market and provides guidance to make more informed investment decisions.

question3.question: What are the types of payments?
question3.answer: You can pay by Credit Card or via Paypal, among many other ways.

question4.question: What if I realized it wasn't for me?
question4.answer: You have 7 days free to try the platform. If you decide it's not for you, simply request a refund on the platform or send an email to contact@yieldmaster.io

question5.question: How long will I have access?
question5.answer: The Plan is Annual. You will have access for as long as your subscription remains active.

question6.question: Does Yield Master provide asset purchase and sale recommendations?
question6.answer: Yes, Yield Master provides asset buy and sell recommendations based on its analysis. However, it is always important to remember that these recommendations are based on past analysis and data, and do not guarantee future results. Investors should always evaluate Yield Master's recommendations along with their own analysis and make their own investment decisions.

question7.question: Can I trust Yield Master’s reviews and recommendations?
question7.answer: Yes, Yield Master is developed by a team of financial experts and uses tried and tested algorithms. However, it is always important to remember that investments involve risks and that no analysis is 100% accurate. It is recommended to use Yield Master as a complementary tool to support your own analysis and market knowledge.

question8.question: Does Yield Master offer customer support?
question8.answer: Yes, Yield Master has a dedicated customer support team ready to assist users with any queries or issues related to using the platform. Support can be contacted via email at support@yieldmastr.io

WhyUs.forAllDesc: Não importa se você é iniciante ou um investidor experiente, o Yield Master foi projetado para atender a todas as necessidades. Com uma interface intuitiva e de fácil navegação, você terá todas as informações necessárias para tomar as melhores decisões de investimento, sem a necessidade de conhecimentos técnicos avançados.
WhyUs.helpDesc: Com o Yield Master você terá acesso a um sistema inteligente que analisa dados do mercado financeiro em tempo real, identificando os momentos mais favoráveis ​​para investir em empresas que tenham potencial de crescimento de dividendos. Nosso algoritmo exclusivo considera uma série de indicadores e tendências, fornecendo informações valiosas para você tomar suas decisões de investimento de forma mais estratégica.
WhyUs.joinDesc: Com o Yield Master você terá acesso a um sistema inteligente que analisa dados do mercado financeiro em tempo real, identificando os momentos mais favoráveis ​​para investir em empresas que tenham potencial de crescimento de dividendos. Nosso algoritmo exclusivo considera uma série de indicadores e tendências, fornecendo informações valiosas para você tomar suas decisões de investimento de forma mais estratégica.
